title: Chef’s Island in 3BR/2BA Apartment near Hollywood Recreation Center
posting_body: ['Villas at Sunrise Mountain', 'CALL US:', 'show contact info', 'x783', 'Want more information?', '<URL>', 'Sierra  3 \xa0bed / 2 bath / 1208 Sq.', 'Ft / From $1,725', '* Unit 1036 - Available 08/11/22', '* Unit 2028 - Available 08/15/22', '* Unit 1025 - Available 09/11/22', '* Unit 2045 - Available 09/13/22', 'Exceptional Location, Remarkable Value', 'Enjoy your morning coffee on the wrap-around patio or deck and take in panoramic mountain views in this three-bedroom, two-bathroom model from Villas at Sunrise Mountain.', 'Together with a pantry and a range of electric appliances make the L-shaped kitchen stand out.', 'The open-concept living and dining area incorporates the added height of the nine-foot ceilings with the comfort of central air conditioning.', 'Other notable features include the full-size washer and dryer in the utility area, the walk-in closet in the master bedroom, and the soaking tubs in the bathrooms.', 'Step outside your apartment to take advantage of a pool area with a spa, a fitness center with modern equipment, and a resident park with grills.', 'Head over to the nearby Hollywood Recreation Center to explore its basketball court and skate park.', 'Speak to a member of the leasing team to get updates on lease terms.', 'Floor Plan/Unit Amenities:', '* Offering 1-, 2-, and 3- Bedroom Apartments', '* Roommate Style Floor Plans Available*', '* Enjoy Majestic Views of Las Vegas', '* Upgraded Interiors*', '* Hardwood Flooring', '* Breakfast Bars', '* Walk-In Closets', '* 9-Foot Ceilings', '* Washer', '* Air Conditioning', '* Private Patio', '* One Assigned Parking Space', '* Rentable Garages Available', '* *Available in Select Apartments', 'Property Amenities:', '* Pool', '* Gate', '* Fitness Center', '* Business Center', '* Picnic Area', '* Gas Grills', '* Clubhouse', '* Night Patrol', '* Garage', '* On-site Maintenance', '* On-site Management', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x783', 'Villas at Sunrise Mountain', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Address:', '6360 E Sahara Ave Las Vegas, NV 89142', 'Online Leasing URL:', '<URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
